entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:07 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 01:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. A few flurries beginning late in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
